page.title: 01A DAY IN MY LIFE.ALEX AGE 8
page.content: I usually wake up before 7.00a.m. i sometimes watch T.V a.m. before my breakfast.I have 2 Weetabix with sugar and milk for breakfast. At twenty to nine I go to school. Register is taken at 9.00a.m. Then we do some solfa singing for ten minutes After that we do assignments.I choose what I want to do out of maths, storywriting, topic work and study skills. Sometimes mums come in to help us with art or sewing. After assignments we go out to play at half past ten. When I come in from play it is time for swimming. We go in two groups of 15 children at a time. I can front crawl, back crawl and turn head over heels. After swimming it is dinner play. At twenty to one we wash and go up to the hall for dinner.
